targets.query: SELECT "amount" FROM "fluids" WHERE "fluid"::tag =~ /${fluid_filter}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "fluid"::tag
SELECT "amount" FROM "items" WHERE ("item"::tag =~ /${item_filter}/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "item"::tag

list.definition: select cpuname,last(busy) from cpus where time > NOW() - 5m group by cpuname
list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu

query.query: select cpuname,last(busy) from cpus where time > NOW() - 5m group by cpuname
